author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man was arrested by the police on Saturday for stealing a high-end camera of a private channel employee recently. According to police, Vinod Raj had placed an online advertisement to rent out his camera. On February 8, he got a call from a man named Shiva, who told Vinod that he would send his assistant Karthik to his office to collect the camera.

When Karthik arrived, Vinod asked him for an identity proof to which the former replied that Shiva had mailed him. Before Vinod could check his mail, Karthik fled with the camera. Vinod filed a complaint, and submitted CCTV footage to the police. With the help of the footage, the police arrested Karthik, and recovered the camera. —staff reporter
title: 1 held for stealing camera
